title: Legend of the Storm Sneezer
description: Legend Seeker. Part-time Ghost Hunter. Time Traveler.Thirteen-year-old Rose Skylar sneezed a magical storm cloud at birth, and itâ€™s followed her around ever since. But when Stormy causes too many disasters, Rose is taken to Heartstone Asylum, a place for kids with unstable magic. Its location? A legendary forest where ghosts roam and the trees have mysteriously turned to stone.Guided by time traveling letters, Rose teams up with her future selves and her possibly imaginary but definitely magical best friend, Marek, to save her storm cloud and solve the mystery of the specters and the stone trees.
